title: Shogo Shimohata
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Iwate%20Grulla%20Morioka">Iwate Grulla Morioka</a>.
Career.
Shogo Shimohata joined Kyoto Sanga from the club's youth team in 2011. He made his professional debut in the <a href="2011%20Emperor%27s%20Cup">Emperor's Cup</a> on January 1, 2012, in a final match against <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a>. He moved to the <a href="Japan%20Football%20League">Japan Football League</a> club <a href="SP%20Kyoto%20FC">Sagawa Printing</a> in 2012. In 2013, he returned to Kyoto Sanga.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 14 April 2020".
